{"image": "//ukcdn.ar-cdn.com/recipes/port512/ac46245b-de81-43f2-87e1-2c5feefc89bf.jpg", "ingredients": ["1 small onion, chopped", "175g (6 oz) mushrooms", "500g (1 1/4 lb) lean beef mince", "4 tablespoons fresh wholemeal breadcrumbs", "1 tablespoon dried mixed herbs", "1 tablespoon tomato pur\u00e9e", "salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste", "flour, for shaping"], "steps": ["Place onion and mushrooms in a food processor and process until finely chopped. Add mince, breadcrumbs, herbs, tomato pur\u00e9e, salt and pepper. Process in bursts for a few seconds at a time, until mixture binds together but still has some texture.", "Mould handfuls of the mince mixture into burger patties using lightly floured hands.", "Using a large frying pan or griddle, cook the burgers for 12 to 15 minutes, turning once, until evenly cooked.", "Serve with relish and salad, in burger buns or pitta breads."], "name": "Beef and mushroom burgers", "prep_time": "5 min", "cook_time": "12 min", "rating": 4.5, "recipe_url": "http://allrecipes.co.uk/recipe/304/beef-and-mushroom-burgers.aspx"}
